channel.title: Players connecting and disconnecting
channel.description:
a few friends of mine are trying to connect to my server through the 4.2 client on moparscape.
They keep getting logged in and out.
Picture.
http://puu.sh/1ZVXS/2900eea369
I am a noob at this stuff so please use language i can understand, any help will be appreciated :D

item.title: Players connecting and disconnecting
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

It’s to do with the type of packets you’re sending when a new player is created. You’ll need to check all your packets under run() and initialize()

Read full topic

item.title: Players connecting and disconnecting
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:9, topic:482316”]Players can connect, but they disconnect…
This might mean, that with Moparscape client–> Cache and Client not fitting the server… You are not using Moparscape client (This is what I understood) and you don’t disconnect, which means your client do fit server… Send this Client to your players also…[/quote]
finally someone knows what they are talking about… :l

Read full topic

item.title: Players connecting and disconnecting
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

Players can connect, but they disconnect…
This might mean, that with Moparscape client–> Cache and Client not fitting the server… You are not using Moparscape client (This is what I understood) and you don’t disconnect, which means your client do fit server… Send this Client to your players also…

Read full topic

item.title: Players connecting and disconnecting
item.dc:creator: @thomashawkins1991 thomashawkins1991
item.description:
@thomashawkins1991 wrote:

are u using no-ip? n what kind of internet do u have? if its dail up that might be why…

Read full topic

item.title: Players connecting and disconnecting
item.dc:creator: @momoe619 momoe619@hotmail.co.uk
item.description:
@momoe619 wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:6, topic:482316”][quote author=momoe619@hotmail.co.uk link=topic=600553.msg4217287#msg4217287 date=1360439850]

Moparscape client does not work on all servers… Just use client, which is made for your server.

hey thanks for the response, how do I get my friends to play on the same client as mine?

Get client for your server, make it to connect your server and then give it to them…
Most simple thing on server coding.

thanks for ur comment ur helping a lot

but is there a guide on how to ‘make it connect to your server’

not trying to flame etc i just need help <3
[/quote]

Just make client for your server…[/quote]

hope you are kidding me, you said that at the start im trying to find a guide on how to.

Read full topic
